snippet.title: Feudums • Top 3 Changes in April and May
snippet.description:
Feudums is an upcoming indie grand strategy game with full modding, player- to-player vassalage and community-driven narrative • a unique crossbred of Crusader Kings and MMO strategy, hand-drawn visuals & the vibe of '90s cult strategy games like the Lords of the Realm. Currently being featured in #TactiCon2023. 

This video is a short visual overview of the 3 most interesting changes we added with the April and May updates. The rest of the changes can be found in the changelogs:
• 0.5.2660: https://feudums.com/comment/1073#comment-1073
• 0.5.2685: https://feudums.com/comment/1074#comment-1074

Subscribe to our channel to never miss our news, work-in-progress developer videos or tutorials!

Follow & Wishlist Feudums on Steam to show us you're interested and to stay in the loop: 
• https://store.steampowered.com/app/473750/Feudums/

Get the latest in-development demo (and take it as our transparent and interactive development diary):
• Links to downloads: https://feudums.com/download
• You can now also grab it directly from our Steam page!

Join the community, talk to the devs, follow them to learn more:

• Discord: https://discord.gg/QgERDnU
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/feudums
• GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/@Feudums
• itch.io: https://kalamonastudios.itch.io/feudums
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/feudumsmmo/
• Feudums website: https://www.feudums.com/

Support us so we can do more in less time:
• Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/feudums


#indiegame #medieval #strategygame #simulationgames #mmo #multiplayer #indiedev #indiegames #indiegamedev #gamerplay #gameupdate #grandstrategy #gamedev #uiuix #4xgame #patreon
